name: AI Chat
description:
Description

Communicate with an AI to solve puzzles and pass levels.

Controls
  • A - D to move.
  • Space to Jump.
  • T to open chat.
  • ESC to exit chat.
  • R to restart level.
Commands Command
ArgumentsDescriptionExamplePlace
Place <X> <Y>Places a tile at the specified coordinates.Place 8 3Remove Remove <X> <Y>Removes the tile at the specified coordinates.Remove 8 3MoveMove <X> <Y> <down-up-right-left> <1-2>Moves a tile from the specified coordinates to the specified direction.Move 8 3 right 1RestartRestartRestarts the current level (or press R).RestartSetSet <Music/SFX>  <0-10>
Sets music or SFX volume to the specified value.Set Music 8PlayPlayGoes to the last unlocked level.PlayLevelLevel <Level number>Goes to the specified level.Level 8MenuMenuGoes to the main menu.Menu

Capitalization doesn't matter.

And there are some Easter eggs too.
